subject: Web3
title: Legal Status of DAOs
description: A micro-lesson that makes Legal Status of DAOs usable.

hook.text: DAOs exist on the blockchain but struggle to exist in law. Most countries have no legal framework for them.

buildup.text: Without legal status, DAOs can't sign contracts, open bank accounts, or pay employees traditionally.

discovery.text: Wyoming became the first US state to recognize DAOs as legal entities in 2021. A few others followed.

twist.text: A court ruled that members of an unregistered DAO could be held personally liable for its actions â€” like a partnership.

climax.text: The legal limbo is a real barrier. DAOs need legal recognition to interact with the traditional world safely.

punchline.text: DAOs work on-chain. Off-chain, the law doesn't know what they are.

quiz.question: What was significant about Wyoming's 2021 legislation?
options: It was the first US state to legally recognize DAOs
It required all DAOs to register
